sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Building, GraduationCap, Users, Search, Shield, CheckCircle, AlertTriangle, TrendingUp, FileText, Download, Upload, Settings, Bell, LogOut, Plus, Filter, Search as SearchIcon, BarChart3, Calendar, Clock, Award, Eye } from 'lucide-react'; const Dashboard: React.FC = () => { const { userType } = useParams<{ userType: string }>(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [pendingInstitutes, setPendingInstitutes] = useState([ { id: 'INST-001', name: 'ABC University', address: '123 Education St, City', contact: 'contact@abc.edu', date: '2024-01-10' }, { id: 'INST-002', name: 'XYZ College', address: '456 Knowledge Ave, Town', contact: 'admin@xyz.edu', date: '2024-01-12' }, { id: 'INST-003', name: 'DEF Institute', address: '789 Learning Rd, Village', contact: 'info@def.edu', date: '2024-01-15' }, ]); const [fraudCertificates, setFraudCertificates] = useState([ { id: 'CERT-101', student: 'John Smith', institute: 'GHI University', type: 'Degree', date: '2024-01-05', status: 'Reported' }, { id: 'CERT-102', student: 'Emma Johnson', institute: 'JKL College', type: 'Diploma', date: '2024-01-08', status: 'Under Review' }, { id: 'CERT-103', student: 'Michael Brown', institute: 'MNO Institute', type: 'Certificate', date: '2024-01-12', status: 'Confirmed' }, ]); const [reports, setReports] = useState([ { id: 'REP-001', name: 'Monthly Verification Report', type: 'PDF', date: '2024-01-01', status: 'Generated' }, { id: 'REP-002', name: 'Fraud Analysis Q4 2023', type: 'Excel', date: '2023-12-15', status: 'Generated' }, ]); const handleApprove = (instituteId: string) => { setPendingInstitutes(pendingInstitutes.filter(inst => inst.id !== instituteId)); // In a real app, you would make an API call here }; const handleReject = (instituteId: string) => { setPendingInstitutes(pendingInstitutes.filter(inst => inst.id !== instituteId)); // In a real app, you would make an API call here }; const handleImposeFine = (certificateId: string) => { // In a real app, you would open a modal or navigate to a fine imposition page alert(`Imposing fine for certificate ${certificateId}`); }; const generateReport = () => { const newReport = { id: `REP-${Math.floor(1000 + Math.random() * 9000)}`, name: `Report_${new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]}`, type: 'PDF', date: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0], status: 'Generated' }; setReports([newReport, ...reports]); }; const userTypeConfig = { government: { title: 'Admin Dashboard', icon: Building, color: 'bg-blue-50 text-blue-600', iconColor: 'bg-blue-100', tabs: ['overview', 'requests', 'institutions', 'reports'], stats: [ { label: 'Pending Approvals', value: '23', change: '', icon: Clock }, { label: 'Active Institutions', value: '456', change: '', icon: Building }, { label: 'Fraud Detected', value: '23', change: '', icon: AlertTriangle }, { label: 'Total Requests', value: '89', change: '', icon: FileText } ] }, institute: { title: 'Institute Dashboard', icon: GraduationCap, color: 'bg-green-50 text-green-600', iconColor: 'bg-green-100', tabs: ['overview', 'students', 'certificates', 'analytics'], stats: [ { label: 'Total Students', value: '2,456', change: '+15%', icon: Users }, { label: 'Certificates Issued', value: '1,890', change: '+22%', icon: Award }, { label: 'Pending Verification', value: '45', change: '-8%', icon: Clock }, { label: 'Success Rate', value: '98.5%', change: '+2%', icon: TrendingUp } ] }, student: { title: 'Student Dashboard', icon: Users, color: 'bg-purple-50 text-purple-600', iconColor: 'bg-purple-100', tabs: ['overview', 'certificates', 'portfolio', 'sharing'], stats: [ { label: 'My Certificates', value: '12', change: '+3', icon: FileText }, { label: 'Verified', value: '11', change: '+2', icon: CheckCircle }, { label: 'Shared', value: '8', change: '+1', icon: Users }, { label: 'Views', value: '156', change: '+24', icon: Eye } ] }, recruiter: { title: 'Recruiter Dashboard', icon: Search, color: 'bg-orange-50 text-orange-600', iconColor: 'bg-orange-100', tabs: ['overview', 'verifications', 'candidates', 'reports'], stats: [ { label: 'Verifications Today', value: '89', change: '+18%', icon: Search }, { label: 'Successful', value: '84', change: '+12%', icon: CheckCircle }, { label: 'Fraud Detected', value: '5', change: '-2', icon: AlertTriangle }, { label: 'Avg. Response Time', value: '2.3s', change: '-0.5s', icon: Clock } ] } }; const config = userTypeConfig[userType as keyof typeof userTypeConfig] || userTypeConfig.student; const Icon = config.icon; const renderGovernmentOverview = () => (
{/* Stats Grid */}
{[ { label: 'Total Institutes', value: '1,245', change: '+12%', icon: Building }, { label: 'Total Students', value: '245,678', change: '+8.5%', icon: Users }, { label: 'Active Verifiers', value: '1,234', change: '+3%', icon: Shield }, { label: 'Fraud Cases', value: '45', change: '-2', icon: AlertTriangle } ].map((stat, index) => { const StatIcon = stat.icon; return (

{stat.label}

{stat.value}

{stat.change && (

{stat.change}

)}
); })}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

Recent Activities

{[ { id: 1, action: 'New institute registration: LMN College', time: '2 hours ago', type: 'registration' }, { id: 2, action: 'Fraud detected: Certificate #CERT-102', time: '5 hours ago', type: 'alert' }, { id: 3, action: 'Monthly report generated', time: '1 day ago', type: 'report' }, ].map(activity => (

{activity.action}

{activity.time}

))}
); const renderCertificates = () => (
{/* Search and Filters */}
{/* Certificates Table */}
{[ { id: 'CERT-001', name: 'John Doe', institution: 'ABC University', status: 'Verified', date: '2024-01-15' }, { id: 'CERT-002', name: 'Jane Smith', institution: 'XYZ College', status: 'Pending', date: '2024-01-14' }, { id: 'CERT-003', name: 'Mike Johnson', institution: 'DEF Institute', status: 'Verified', date: '2024-01-13' }, { id: 'CERT-004', name: 'Sarah Wilson', institution: 'GHI University', status: 'Fraud', date: '2024-01-12' } ].map((cert, index) => ( ))}
Certificate ID Student Name Institution Status Date Actions
{cert.id} {cert.name} {cert.institution} {cert.status} {cert.date}
); const renderRequestsTab = () => (

Pending Institute Requests

{pendingInstitutes.map((institute) => ( ))}
Institute ID Name Address Contact Registration Date Actions
{institute.id} {institute.name} {institute.address} {institute.contact} {institute.date}
); const renderFraudTab = () => (

Fraud Certificates

{fraudCertificates.map((cert) => ( ))}
Certificate ID Student Institute Type Date Reported Status Actions
{cert.id} {cert.student} {cert.institute} {cert.type} {cert.date} {cert.status}
); const renderReportsTab = () => (

Reports

{reports.map((report) => ( ))}
Report ID Name Type Date Generated Status Actions
{report.id} {report.name} {report.type} {report.date} {report.status}
); const renderTabContent = () => { if (userType === 'government') { switch (activeTab) { case 'overview': return renderGovernmentOverview(); case 'requests': return renderRequestsTab(); case 'institutions': return renderFraudTab(); case 'reports': return renderReportsTab(); default: return renderGovernmentOverview(); } } else { switch (activeTab) { case 'overview': return renderGovernmentOverview(); case 'certificates': return renderCertificates(); default: return (

{activeTab.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + activeTab.slice(1)} Section

This section is under development. More features coming soon!

); } }; return (
{/* Header */}

{config.title}

Welcome back!

{/* Navigation Tabs */}
{config.tabs.map((tab) => ( ))}
{/* Main Content */}
{renderTabContent()}
); }; }; export default Dashboard;
